alert.note: Alert for Stanley; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 12:18AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sully and north central Stanley Counties through 145 AM CDT/1245 AM MDT/... At 118 AM CDT/1218 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chantier Creek Recreation Area, or 20 miles northwest of Fort Pierre, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mission Ridge around 1230 AM MDT. Little Bend Rec Area and Bush`S Landing around 135 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
